snippet: John Isner served 29 aces and rallied to beat a Colombian qualifier, Santiago Giraldo, in the first round of the Shanghai Masters.
abstract: John Isner serves 29 aces and rallies to beat a Colombian qualifier, Santiago Giraldo, in the first round of the Shanghai Masters.
